actions.text: Reported to House from the Committee on Rules, H. Rept. 96-385.
Measure called up by unanimous consent in House.

official_title: A resolution providing for the consideration of H.R. 4167, to amend sec. 201 of the Agricultural Act of 1949, as amended, to extend until Sept. 30, 1981, the requirement that the price of milk be supported at not less than 80 per centum of the parity price therefore.

summary.text: Sets forth the rule for the consideration of H.R. 4167 (Milk price support).

titles.title: A resolution providing for the consideration of H.R. 4167, to amend sec. 201 of the Agricultural Act of 1949, as amended, to extend until Sept. 30, 1981, the requirement that the price of milk be supported at not less than 80 per centum of the parity price therefore.
